Package me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.record

Class Replay

java.lang.Object
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.util.ContainsViewers<org.bukkit.entity.Player>
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.record.Replay
public class Replay extends ContainsViewers<org.bukkit.entity.Player>
This class is used to play recorded replay of a player.

  • Constructor Details

    • Replay

      public Replay(Record replay)

  • Method Details

    • setGlobalReplay

      public void setGlobalReplay(boolean global)
      Makes the NPC global for players at the time of calling {@link this#start()}.
      Parameters:
      global - - global.

    • pause

      public void pause()
      Pauses current replay if it's playing. - NPC will be frozen at the last frame is replay is paused. - Replay will have no effect if it's not playing, but the NPC will not move after calling {@link this#start()}.

    • isPaused

      public boolean isPaused()
      Returns true if replay is currently paused, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true if replay is currently paused, false otherwise.

    • isPlaying

      public boolean isPlaying()
      Returns true is replay is currently playing, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true is replay is currently playing, false otherwise.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops replay and removes the NPC if it was playing.

    • start

      public void start()
      Stars replay. Summons NPC and iterates through frames.
